column5: Hi all,  I was just feeling so proud of him after watching this again i felt the need to share it...lol.  He has only ever tried his skates on once before. He did so well keeping his balance and even when he fell he had a great big grin on...I LOVE HIM!     <iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/b0xbblb8Rb0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Skating is not easy to learn.... Jack did great for his second time Thanks for sharing Simon Jacques
Great stuff Simon and nice oval rink! Leah would be in seventh heaven with that in her back yard!
I love your familly. Care to adopt me

Loved it Simon..I gotta say its been so much fun watching Jack grow. Seems like yesterday he was born. They sure do grow quick..Way to go Jack!!!! Maybe one day he can get Dad (and his firends)some free Leaf tickets when you go watch him play!!!!!

your doing everything right Simon....before you know it ...he will be in college....these memories are going to make you feel warm and fuzzy inside even moreso years from now when you review them....  Thanks for sharing your happy moments
